detectors.description:
TokenERC20._transfer(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SDS.sol#94-103) has assert violation
	Assert violations:
	- assert(bool)(balanceOf[_from].add(balanceOf[_to]) == previousBalances) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SDS.sol#102)

TokenERC20.release() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SDS.sol#84-87) uses a Boolean constant improperly:
	-released = ! released (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SDS.sol#86)

SDS (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SDS.sol#157-195) inherits the contract, there is a conflict between state variables and functions
	Conflicting functions and state variables:
	- owned.owner (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SDS.sol#40)
	- owned.onlyOwner() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SDS.sol#46-49)
	- owned.onlyOwner() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SDS.sol#46-49)
	- owned.transferOwnership(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SDS.sol#51-53)
	- owned.transferOwnership(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SDS.sol#51-53)
detectors.markdown:
[SDS](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SDS.sol#L157-L195) inherits the contract, there is a conflict between state variables and functions
	Conflicting functions and state variables:
	- [owned.owner](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SDS.sol#L40)
	- [owned.onlyOwner()](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SDS.sol#L46-L49)
	- [owned.onlyOwner()](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SDS.sol#L46-L49)

	- [owned.transferOwnership(address)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SDS.sol#L51-L53)

detectors.description:
TokenERC20._transfer(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SDS.sol#94-103) may have integer overflow
	Possible nodes:
	- require(bool)(balanceOf[_to] + _value > balanceOf[_to]) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SDS.sol#97)

detectors.description:
owned.transferOwnership(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SDS.sol#51-53) should emit an event for: 
	- owner = newOwner (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SDS.sol#52)

owned.transferOwnership(address).newOwner (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SDS.sol#51) lacks a zero-check on :
		- owner = newOwner (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SDS.sol#52)
solc-0.4.26 is not recommended for deployment
detectors.markdown: solc-0.4.26 is not recommended for deployment

detectors.description: Contract owned (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SDS.sol#39-54) is not in CapWords

Parameter TokenERC20.burn(uint256)._value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SDS.sol#138) is not in mixedCase

SDS.smartfastConstructorVariables() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SDS.sol#157-195) uses literals with too many digits:
	- totalSupply = 20000000000000000000000000000 (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SDS.sol#64)

detectors.description:
transferOwnership(address) should be declared external:
	- owned.transferOwnership(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SDS.sol#51-53)

release() should be declared external:
	- TokenERC20.release() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SDS.sol#84-87)

transfer(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- TokenERC20.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SDS.sol#105-108)

burn(uint256) should be declared external:
	- TokenERC20.burn(uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SDS.sol#138-144)

burnFrom(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- TokenERC20.burnFrom(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SDS.sol#146-154)

mintToken(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- SDS.mintToken(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SDS.sol#181-187)

freezeAccount(address,bool) should be declared external:
	- SDS.freezeAccount(address,bool) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SDS.sol#189-192)
